text: phir jab tumhaare paas ilm (kuraan) aa chuka usake baad bhee agar tum se koee (nasaraanee) eesa ke baare mein hujjat karen to kaho ki (achchha maidaan mein) aao ham apane beton ko bulaen tum apane beton ko aur ham apanee auraton ko (bulaen) aur tum apanee auraton ko aur ham apanee jaanon ko bulaen or tum apanee jaanon ko
